title: A Visit to Don's Produce Arena WI

tasks.task: Performing irrigation and farming tasks for sweet potatoes and other crops.
subtasks: Using a tractor with a power takeoff (PTO) to operate a water pump.
Adjusting the water pump's speed to control the amount of irrigation.
Observing sweet potato growth and noting the importance of moisture.
Liberating bumble bees from a hive to pollinate tomatoes in a greenhouse.
Monitoring tomato ripening and adjusting vine supports as needed.
Watering and managing strawberries grown in stackers.
Sustaining proper greenhouse conditions for pollinator activity.

tasks.task: Operating agricultural equipment and implementing farming techniques.
subtasks: Demonstrating the use of irrigation systems for crop establishment.
Explaining the relationship between moisture and sweet potato growth.
Highlighting the importance of timely pollination in tomato production.
Discussing the advantages of vertical farming methods for strawberries and greens.
Ensuring optimal environmental conditions for crop growth and health.
